item.title: Help With Pk Points
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

first i added this under

public int pkPoints = 0;
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

then i added

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

under

} else if (token.equals(“character-saradomin”)) {
saraKills = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Then I added killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); killerz.pkPoints += 2; }

under

if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunFight() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied();

Then I added

haracterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length());

under

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-pin = ", 0, 16); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(bankPin), 0, Integer.toString(bankPin).length());

So i did all this. Then when i log in, its fine. When you log out you reset. Then everytime you log in after that you get reset…
